June 1, 2019 D Ripon Contest
Ripon Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
ripon-contest
Ripon Cathedral, Ripon, North Yorkshire, England, UK Most Entertaining Programme: Uppermill Best Soloist: soprano cornet, Leyburn Best Euphonium Player: Lofthouse 2000 Best March: Uppermill Best Hymn Tune: Leyburn Best Percussion: Uppermill Best 4th section/unregistered band not in top 3 places: Spennymoor Town
The trophy for best Youth Band not in the top 3 places was not awarded in 2019 owing to Shepherd Group Youth achieving 3rd place, and being the only Youth Band entered.
June 8, 2019, 7:48 a.m. June 8, 2019, 8:05 a.m.

2 Leyburn Rebecca Lundberg
3 Shepherd Group Youth Craig Brown
